properties.name: cssClass
properties.description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to the item.

properties.name: locateInMenu
properties.description: Specifies when to display an item in the toolbar's overflow menu.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Specifies a location for the item on the toolbar.

properties.name: menuItemComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [menuItemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: menuItemRender
properties.description: An alias for the [menuItemTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: menuItemTemplate
properties.description: Specifies a template that should be used to render a menu item.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Configures the DevExtreme UI component used as a toolbar item.

properties.name: showText
properties.description: Specifies when to display the text for the UI component item.

properties.name: widget
properties.description: A UI component that presents a toolbar item. To configure it, use the [options] object.
